name: CreateTestVariables
description: Creates variables from a test run associated with this build and release.
helpMarkDown: Creates variables from a test run associated with this build and release. Variables created are: TestRunId, TestRunName, TestRunUrl, TestRunColor (good, warning, danger), and <Outcome(Passed|Failed)>Count.
author: Gio Palacino

inputs.name: VariablePrefix
inputs.label: Variable Prefix
inputs.helpMarkDown: A prefix to use when creating variables. Example: $([Prefix]TestRunId)

inputs.name: TestTitle
inputs.label: Test Title
inputs.helpMarkDown: A string which is in the title of the desired test run.

messages.NoTestTitle: No test title was provided, this is a wide-open match against test runs.
messages.NoAccessToken: No access token is available for API calls. Did you forget to turn on the "Allow scripts to access OAuth token" option under Build -> Options, or Release -> Environment -> Run On Agent?
